law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 385, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1784.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Owner may require adjoining owner to erect portion of fence -- Notice -- Erection at expense of other owner -- Lien.
